name: Austrian Institute for European Law and Policy
goal:
Research institution working on European law related issues,
actual issues are inter alia:
EU + direct democracy + Civil Dialogues ( Art 11(1) and (2) TEU nv ) + EU Human Rights + EU Citizens´Rights * EU Referendum
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
